name: Special Topics in Engineering
descripton: Discussion of special topics in engineering. Identification of various specific topics and prerequisites for each section from term to term.

name: Non-Thesis Masters Continuous Registration-Half Time Registration
descripton: For students in non-thesis master's programs who have completed all credit hour requirements for their degree but need to maintain half-time continuous registration to complete incomplete grades, final master's exam, etc.

name: Non-Thesis Masters Continuous Registration-Full Time Registration
descripton: For students in non-thesis master's programs who have completed all credit hour requirements for their degree but need to maintain full-time continuous registration to complete incomplete grades, projects, final master's exam, etc. Students may register for this course a maximum of one semester.
